explains: v. 使胆寒；使惊骇（appall 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The idea of sharing a room appalled her.
sentences.cn: 合住一个房间的想法使她惊骇。

sentences.en: I was appalled by the loutish behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这种粗野行为令我大为震惊。

sentences.en: The brutality of the crime has appalled the public.
sentences.cn: 罪行之残暴使公众大为震惊。
